summary: ABBA was a super popular Swedish pop group formed in 1972. They won the Eurovision Song Contest in 1974 with "Waterloo," which became their biggest hit. The group was made up of two married couples, but as they got more famous, their personal lives got tough, and the marriages ended. After breaking up in 1982, they went on to have successful solo careers. Years later, their music was turned into a hit musical and movie called *Mamma Mia!*. ABBA is one of the best-selling music artists ever, and they were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2010. They reunited in 2016 and released new music in 2021.
title: ABBA
